title: Trouble transfering region.
body: Hi, I live in Australia but because I have alot of American friends i made a NA league account and yesterday i decided to transfer it to OCE, so i purchased a region transfer and when i try to long into it on NA it tells me that it is transferring and to wait afew minutes but i cant login to it on OCE either and it has been over 24 hours. The account name is ProfWombo, this account  was an alt for Australia, but i cant login as ProfWombo to either Na or OCE, so I'm using this account. I was wondering if its meant to take this long or if its bugger or what or not.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you still experiencing this issue?

As this is an account specific inquiry, you'll have to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to the friendly people over at Player Support, as we here on the boards are unable to assist with account specific inquiries.
